reviews.text:
Really helpful and an efficient service from those working at dewsbury train station. Resolved an issue I had very quickly and professionally. 

Thank you to the staff who helped get my bag back to me and sending it on the next train to the airport :) (had my passport in meaning we could get on our flight after all!)

Undergoing renovations currently in winter, not sure why they decided to do this but this has meant, waiting rooms on one side of the platform are closed. Sadly, no toilets at this station but there is a pub that has them, not much use if you're catching an early train. There is also a small confectionery shop and a manned ticked desk.
